title: Culturally sensitive conservation approaches needed to protect Ethiopian church forests

title_detail.value: Culturally sensitive conservation approaches needed to protect Ethiopian church forests

summary: Human disturbance reduces forest density, biomass, and richness of species in sacred church forests of northern Ethiopia, according to new research.
